original_text: And Moses went out of the city from Pharaoh, and spread abroad his hands unto the Lord: and the thunders and hail ceased, and the rain was not poured upon the earth.
korean_text: 모세가 바로를 떠나 성에서 나가 여호와를 향하여 손을 펴매 우렛소리와 우박이 그치고 비가 땅에 내리지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: And Moses went out of the city from Pharaoh,
and spread abroad his hands unto the Lord:
and the thunders and hail ceased,
and the rain was not poured upon the earth.
